description: Parse and identify user agent strings

tests.name: parse_chrome_windows
tests.comment: Parse Chrome on Windows 10 user agent

input.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36

expected.value:
Browser
Name: Chrome 91.0.4472.124
Family: Chrome
Version: 91.0.4472.124
Major: 91
Minor: 0
Patch: 4472

Device
Type: 
Vendor: 
Model: 

Engine
Name: Blink
Version: 

Operating System
Name: Windows 10
Version:
